ShortDescription.Value: Allows easy change of the max capacity of all transit depots and total passengers

Publish.LongDescription:
## Depot Capacity Redux
- Easily increase the maximum capacity of transit depots; how many vehicles each depot building can have. - Reduces the number of depots needed to save room in a city. - New: Total Passengers slider to increase how many passengers each vehicle can carry (e.g. buses, trains, etc.) - New: Four more languages supprted - Options menu sliders can be adjusted in-game without restarting. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection, making it more compatible with other mods and less likely to break with game updates.
## Languages
Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese)
